message: Function wp_register_style was called incorrectly. Scripts and styles should not be registered or enqueued until the wp_enqueue_scripts, admin_enqueue_scripts, or login_enqueue_scripts hooks. This notice was triggered by the auth_discuss_style handle. Please see Debugging in WordPress for more information. (This message was added in version 3.3.0.) in /wordpress/wp-includes/functions.php on line 6121

message: Function is_feed was called incorrectly. Conditional query tags do not work before the query is run. Before then, they always return false. Please see Debugging in WordPress for more information. (This message was added in version 3.1.0.) in /wordpress/wp-includes/functions.php on line 6121
